name: Couldn't Chair Less
description:
In Couldn't chair less you play as Chairemy, a sentient chair that is sick of being sat on and misused. After recently being thrown away he takes out his vengeance on his office.

In this game, you kill and take out different office personnel in creative ways while not being noticed. your goal is to see vengeance and rid the office of those who wronged you.

This game isn't as polished as id love it to be for now but it is currently on hold.
